name: Bambino Rally 3
description: The successor of Bambino Rally 3 has appeareed. Once again you can ride old polish mini cars. Prepare for unique racing experience that cannot be copared to any other game.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: Pentium IV 3 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: mx 440 Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: XP/7/8/10 Processor: i3 Memory: 1 GB RAM
